plot: In the snowy Himalayan regions a little girl Sasha befriends a Yeti when the news comes out through media the goons plan to kidnap Yeti and take him out of the country to earn more money.
title: Ajooba Kudrat Ka
plot_es: In the snowy Himalayan regions a little girl Sasha befriends a Yeti when the news comes out through media the goons plan to kidnap Yeti and take him out of the country to earn more money.
